answers.answer: have you started taking antihistamines lately? a coworker had similar problems (though not so severe) with dry mouth that was causing gum recession due to her new allergy medication.

If you google xerostomia, you'll get sufficient information.Seeing an oral pathologist to evaluate and manage your subjective or objective xerostomia is advised.Seeing a periodontist to determine the specific cause of gum recession is advised.
